item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Zombie
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
The Zombie

Neutral Killer

Passive (Undead) You are immune to death, occupation and target changing at night.

Night Ability (Brains!) - Attack a player, infecting them if they survive. If they are defended by a Knight or bear, you will infect them instead. (Infinite uses)

Night Ability (Outbreak) - Same as Brains! Additionally, all infected players will attack whoever they visit tonight. (2 uses)

Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon, Unseen/Cult and any neutrals who seek to do you harm.

Read full topic
